Nerangs.ab: va mašrabe-ye āb bar dāštan va āb az mašrabe-ye bozorg be mašrabe-ye ḫord riḫtan tā porr šawad tā yek-pāre niz foru rizad va digar bāre xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ aṣ̌əm vohū yek ḫāndan va se bār āb az mašrabe-ye bozorg dar mašrabe-ye ḫord riḫtan va niku āb rā ehtyāṭ yek zarre az mašrabe-ye ḫord dar mašrabe-ye bozorg riḫtan bār-e awwal be-wāǧ goftan ke yōzdās̱are zarre farākard va bār-e dowwom be-wāǧ guftan ke yōzdās̱are zarre-ye varkaš bār-e seiwom be-wāǧ guftan ke yōzdās̱are zarre-ye puiti harwisb minuy-e ardvīsūr āb-e pāk-e yōzdās̱are pas in-rā āb-e pādyāvi guyand pas har do dast barsom-čin b-ān āb šostan yek šāḫ-e barsom be-dast-e rāst be-gereftan va sar-aš be-daste-čab va barsom-čin be-gereftan va se bār namāz bordan pas xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ aṣ̌əm vohū se

"He should raise the vessel for the water and pour the water from the big vessel into the small one until it is full and and a bit of water overflows."Then he should recite xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ (ParagnaLL1.1.3) and one Aṣ̌əm Vohū (ParagnaLL1.1.4). He should pour three times water from the big vessel into the small vessel and then a bit of water from the small vessel into the big vessel as a reserve. The first time while whispering: yōzdās̱are zereh-ye farākard. The second time while whispering: yōzdās̱are zereh-ye vurkaš. The third time while whispering: yōzdās̱are zereh-ye puiti harvisb minuy-e arvīsūr āb-e pāk-e yōzdās̱are. Then, they determine it as pure water (āb-e pādyāvi). Afterwards, he should wash his two hands and the barsom-čin with this water, take a branch of the barsom with the right hand and take its end and the barsom-čin with the left hand. He should bring namāz three times and recite then xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ and three Aṣ̌əm Vohū."
